summary: A small edit of Housecarl Lydia.
descriptionHtml:
Lydia as a Battlemage UNP

This is a quick edit of Housecarl Lydia.
She is a battlemage.
Has full AI Package set. 3 eat, 1 sleep, 1 sandbox current location, 1 default master package, plus the vanilla Housecarl packages.
She has all spells and perks related to her class.
Levels with player.
Can be married.
Uthgerd (Tess) is her cousin and an ally.
Also ally of Serana.
Comes equiped with daedric dagger, staff of incineration, cure poison potion, cure desease potion, restore all potion, food, drink, and other misc items.
She is set essensial.

Requirements:
Skyrim.esm, update.esm, dawnguard.esm, dragonborn.esm, and hearthfires.esm
SG Hairs by Hello Santa: http://pan.baidu.com/wap/link?uk=3574985185&shareid=2204221951&third=0
******A note here: Hello Santa Hairs comes with an ESM and an ESP. In order to load both as master I had to convert the ESP to a ESM.
I made no other changes to it and have included that ESM only in this mod. You still need to download SG Hairs and replace their
ESP with this ESM. Do not delete their SGHairPackBase.esm

Whats included in this mod:
Tattoos for UNP female body by: candymanXXL: www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7834/?
SGHairPackAIO.esm (This is the ESP file from SG Hairs changed to an ESM, needed to do this because can only add ESM's as masters). Just copy/paste to your Skyrim data folder. Then go in data folder and delete the SGHairPackAIO.esp.
Lydia.esp
textures
Images of Lydia
The page your reading now.

Once you download this mod it's yours to do with as you wish. All I request is you respect the wishes of the other authors that have provided resources for this mod.
I'm here to share with this community in the hopes of extending your enjoyment of this game. Not here for ego boosting.
So if this mod is not for you, don't tell me about it, just move on to one you do like.
If you like it a little, then download it and open it in CK and change what you don't like.
Once you download this mod it's yours to do with as you wish.
[color=#cc4125][b][size=4]All I request is you respect the wishes of the other authors that have provided resources for this mod.[/size][/b][/color]

A big thanks to:
Hello Santa: http://pan.baidu.com/wap/linkuk=3574985185&shareid=2204221951&third=0
